sentence: internet free only one hour a day in the loby costs in the room
The person at the front desk reception was very unfriendly and not too helpful
On Shabat both weekends it was like a chaotic daycare center in the lobby with screaming kids running free and pushing all buttons in the elevators even though they are not supposed to
No wifi in room but I could sit at the spacious lobby and use wifi as long as I wished5
I started having to go back down stairs to get it reconected everytime I came back to the room
Breakfast buffet is gracious BUT the odor fumes of cooking hit you at the entrance to the dining room removing any desire or ability to swallow anything
Dirty poorly run hotel with good conference space and lobby but that is about all
Touch screen kiosk near reception area thin on information for transportation ads really
Whirlpool should have a button to allow guests to turn it on
This time we did not like the new face of the lobby and the halls
They have a several mini shops at the lobby where you can shop for souvenirs and more
Price was reasonable for an hotel the food was fine and the lobby itself was nicely designed

Pros Easy access to Metro train Friendly staff Big Rooms Indoor Pool Gym SaunaCons Hotel room could do with minor refurbishment Food for breakfast dinner was mostly the same No Lamb served only Beef or Chicken Hotel lifts are jammed packed controlled from Friday evening onwards to celebrate the Jewish Sabbath
The room was quite large and the amenities satisfactory
Quality boarding lodging facilities in the Worlds most precious City of King David

I have been to Israel many times and stayed at different hotelsI was pleasantly surprised this visit to find the Ramado service to be excellent in all respectsThe staff at the reception were particularly helpful and very eager to help in any way posibleSurprisingly also the rate per day was the cheapest of all the hotels in JerusalemI will be coming back soon and be happy to stay here againIt seems the only problem is that the hotel is mostly fully booked not surprising
Nice Lobby Great view of the sea Great Buffet Breakfast
The property has 2 pools sauna and exercise facilities
Spacious rooms with beautiful viewLovely stafGod facilities
From start to end was just a fantastic experience Ahmad at reception was extremely polite and helpful
